biotools.summary: Barracuda is a high-speed sequence aligner based on BWA and uses the latest Nvidia CUDA architecture for accelerating alignments of sequence reads generated by the next-generation sequencers.

bioschemas.name: BarraCUDA
bioschemas.summary: Barracuda is a high-speed sequence aligner based on BWA and uses the latest Nvidia CUDA architecture for accelerating alignments of sequence reads generated by the next-generation sequencers.
